name: Forum of European Muslim Youth and Student organisations
goal: Our vision is to enable each member organisation to achieve their full potential within European society and thus contribute to the development of a diverse, cohesive and prosperous Europe. Our mission is to facilitate development, networking and cooperation between European Muslim youth and student organisations and to be their representative voice within all European institutions.
interests: Culture, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives:
Intergroup on Religious Intolerance
Intergroup on Racism, Diversity
DG Education and Culture
DG Justice, Fundamental Rights and Citizenship
